game_description: Welcome to target shooting at our friendly, target-rich farm! Short and long ranges with: - plinking targets, - scoring targets, - clay pigeons, - some chickens, - a small 3-gun range, and more! The full game is GUNS: www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/8960111530681079/ - full auto weapons, optics, scarecrows that attack, and more! Use the shot timer or shoot at leisure! Accurate ballistics (per ammunition type) and loading mechanics. This free alpha demo includes a limited selection of guns and ammunition. Install size is around 115 MB. 120 Hz works on the Quest 2 if enabled there in Settings/Experimental features! All comments are welcome - see also reddit.com/r/gunsgame for bug reports, ideas, or general questions! Also tested on Quest 1.
review_1: There’s basically nothing to do, It’s just 3 guns and targets.
review_2: For the small amount of things you can do this game is fun makes me want to buy The full version of the game I recommend . Also I think they should add pigs that run around and you can shoot just like the chickens
review_3: Some things I think you should add are arms instead of the oculus controllers maybe also some zombie full body targets that could kill you anyway that's all from me great game excited for updates in the future
review_4: Me and my friend like shooters where we can have small battles for Pavlov shack vr is our favourite one so far we are looking for more WE WANT ONLINE
review_5: Much better than it originally was. Still a few kinks but I believe it will work out to be good. I recorded some gameplay of it and I'm posting it on my YouTube channel https://youtube.com/channel/UClbQ25XPq0wZoe_PUvU1hzA tomorrow or May 17. I look forward to some more updates to this game.
